thread.title: Police divers searching for missing person in Central Park pond
thread.title_full: Police divers searching for missing person in Central Park pond

author: Katherine Rosenberg-Douglas
title: Police divers searching for missing person in Central Park pond
text:
Police divers searching for missing person in Central Park pond Police lights (Tribune photo illustration) Katherine Rosenberg-Douglas Chicago Tribune 
Divers from the Chicago Police Departmentâ€™s marine unit Sunday afternoon were searching the Columbus Park lagoon for a missing person, police said. 
About 2:45 p.m. authorities got a call about a person in the water at Columbus Park, in the 500 block of South Central Avenue. 
A body had not been recovered as of 3:35 p.m. 
Officials could not release the identity of the missing person they were searching for. 
This is a developing story, check back for updates.
